added: Never a good day without you, {name}!
Wow, {name}, long time no see! Yo!
Can we try without {name} this time?
You were supposed to be on vacation, {name}!
Woohoo, did {name} wake up so early?
modifiers: Speak no longer than 60 seconds. READY, STEADY, GO!
Try speaking with a British accent, I dare you.
Today we speak like an excited kid would!
TIME MACHINE! What are your plans for tomorrow?
Let's have a contest: let's use as few words as possible. Who will be the winner?
